post.meta_description: Eldina Jaganjac, 31, from Copenhagan, Denmark, grew frustrated by the fact that women are expected to spend more time and money on maintaining their looks through hair removal than men are.
post.meta_title: Woman, 31, who refuses to shave off her moustache and unibrow says it helps her love life | Daily Mail Online
post.title: Woman, 31, who refuses to shave off her moustache and unibrow says it helps her love life

body:
> she said she grew frustrated by the fact women are expected to spend more time and money on maintaining their looks through hair removal than men are.  

As a man, if my eyebrows were in that state, I don't expect to find any potential partners.

I got a cheap laugh from this, but I'm kind of sick of people who think individuality is something you show through your appearance. Go develop some hobbies and interests, build up your own opinions, experience the world and let some experiences outside the usual shape you. Individuality is shown through your actions and speech, and the personality associated with it. Not with a shallow personality portrayed by your appearance.
body_html:
she said she grew frustrated by the fact women are expected to spend more time and money on maintaining their looks through hair removal than men are.

As a man, if my eyebrows were in that state, I don't expect to find any potential partners.

I got a cheap laugh from this, but I'm kind of sick of people who think individuality is something you show through your appearance. Go develop some hobbies and interests, build up your own opinions, experience the world and let some experiences outside the usual shape you. Individuality is shown through your actions and speech, and the personality associated with it. Not with a shallow personality portrayed by your appearance.

post.meta_description: Eldina Jaganjac, 31, from Copenhagan, Denmark, grew frustrated by the fact that women are expected to spend more time and money on maintaining their looks through hair removal than men are.
post.meta_title: Woman, 31, who refuses to shave off her moustache and unibrow says it helps her love life | Daily Mail Online
post.title: Woman, 31, who refuses to shave off her moustache and unibrow says it helps her love life
